com.riskgame.strategy

Class Cheater

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.riskgame.strategy.Cheater
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PlayerStrategy

    public class Cheater
extends java.lang.Object
implements PlayerStrategy
    Cheater player whose reinforcement method doubles the army count on all its countries, attack method automatically conquers all the neighbors of all its countries, doubles the number of armies on its countries that have neighbors that belong to other players.
    Author:
    Shresthi, Anusha

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Cheater() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void allOutAttack(GameMapGraph gameMapGraph, Player player, Country attackerCountry, Country defenderCountry)
      this method is combined with the attack phase for the cheater player
      void attackPhase(GameMapGraph gameMapGraph, Player player, Country attacker, Country defender)
      this method is for the attack of the cheater player.
      void fortificationPhase(GameMapGraph gameMapGraph, Player player, Country fromCountry, Country toCountry, int armiesCount)
      this method is used for fortifying the countries of the cheater player that are neighbors to countries owned by other players
      void placeArmies(GameMapGraph mapGraph, Player player, Country country)
      this method is used to place armies in the countries owned by the cheater player
      void reinforcementPhase(Player player, GameMapGraph mapGraph, Country country, int reinforceArmyCount)
      this method is used for the reinforcement of the cheater player's countries, it doubles the armies on each country
